lines: I am proud to fight for your cause, #p!
Let us go forth and slay some Rakh√¢s scum!
My beard is itching for battle.
Our foes shall be crushed like a rack of fresh ribs!
The axes of the Dwarves are sharpened for battle, #p!
Few in Middle-earth can stand against the might of Durin's Folk!
This is all well and good, but where has all the ale gone?
We Dwarves are valiant warriors! All foes shall tremble beneath our hammers and axes!
No Orc shall escape the edge of my axe!
It is truly an honour to fight beside a warrior such as yourself, #p!
You have my axe, #p!
You are a mighty warrior, #p, but your beard will never be the equal of mine! Ha!
It is an honour to fight beside you, #p. Even with that modest excuse for a beard!
You fight well, #p, but your beard has a long way to grow yet!
Be sure you give that beard of yours time to grow before we fight!
Proud am I to fight alongside the mightiest beard the race of Men ever produced!
I call it an honour to fight with one so full-bearded as yourself!
With that beard of yours, #p, we'll have no trouble bashing some Orcs!
I'd sell my beard for a drink of Dwarven ale.
Ah! I miss the great stone halls of the Iron Hills. But a Dwarf will not run from battle!
Ah! I miss the pine-clad slopes of the Iron Hills. But a Dwarf will not run from battle!
By my beard, I would run ten leagues just for one pint of fresh Dwarven ale!
